metadata.title: CVE-2021-21845 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Multiple exploitable integer overflow vulnerabilities exist within theMPEG-4 decoding functionality of the GPAC Project on Advanced Contentlibrary v1.0.1. A specially crafted MPEG-4 input in “stsc” decoder cancause an integer overflow due to unchecked arithmetic resulting in aheap-based buffer overflow that causes memory corruption. An attacker canconvince a user to open a video to trigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: gpac package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
